snippet: Did you have an ancestor on the Titanic? As the 100th anniversary of the disaster at sea approaches, we invite readers to share recollections of their own families whose lives were inextricably linked with the ship.
abstract: Did you have an ancestor on the Titanic? As the 100th anniversary of the disaster at sea approaches, we invite readers to share recollections of their own families whose lives were inextricably linked with the ship.

headline.print_headline: Titanic Centenary Lets Irish Village Express, and Maybe Stem, Its Loss
